name: Greater Steal

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Steal, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to steal an item from a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Improved Steal. If you successfully steal an item from a foe during combat, it does not notice the theft until after combat is over or if it attempts to use the missing item.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Creatures automatically notice items taken from them through the steal combat maneuver.
sections.name: Normal

description: You have a knack for snatching items from your opponents in combat.
